modName: Clare - The Wandering Aventurer Follower Mod Standalone
summary: Clare the wandering adventurer from many worlds away has arrived in skyrim, she made it to Riverwood and is awaiting a good adventure :)
descriptionHtml:
700 DOWNLOADS? SPECTACULAR! i wish i could add Clares Rapier but i have hit a snag with the whole conversion from Nifscope to Creation Kit, ive done the conversion once ages ago but i just cant remember how i did it, if anyone could offer some help, advice or assistance MESSAGE ME! i check my messages at least 3 times a day! :D


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hello everyone! i present an updated version on my Clare follower mod, with multiple changes to Clare herself.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
NEWS : STANDALONE VERSION IS COMPLETE! 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


- PLANS -

-Clare came to skyrim from a distant land beyond tamriel, hopefully eventually i will model her a custom bow and sword instead of her stock ebony versions

-Like the weapons, Clare might have armor that is different to skyrims versions. time will tell :D 


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Section 1 : The mod 

Clare has made her way around to Riverwood from Solitude, she can be found in the Sleeping Giant Inn awaiting the player.

Clare comes with her own uniquely named ebony bow and sword.


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
CLARE THE WANDERING ADVENTURER FOLLOWER MOD STANDALONE BY CROC CO AKA ARBITERR13

VERSION 2.4
FIDDLED WITH CLARES FACE, CHANGED SOME SLIDERS E.T.C, THANKS TO CHOCO2114 FOR GIVING ME ADVICE, YOU CAN FIND HER STUFF HERE http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6204470/?
VERSION 2.3
FIXED THE APACHIISKYHAIR MASTER FILE ISSUE 
VERSION 2.2 
ATTEMPTED TO FIX THE APACHIISKYHAIR ISSUE, THOUGHT I DID BUT I DIDNT ;(
VERSION 2.1
IRONED OUT SOME ISSUES 
VERSION 2.0
BETA TESTING, RELEASED THE BETA FILE AS OPTIONAL TO THE PUBLIC, ALL KNOWN BETA TESTERS OF THE TIME WILL BE RECORDED INTO CREDITS 
VERSION 1.0 
UPLOAD, TO MY SUPPRISE PEOPLE ACTUALLY DOWNLOADED MY MOD, RESPONSES WERE DECENT EXCEPT FOR A SELECT FEW USERS (RACK OFF, ITS MY MOD ILL DO WHAT I WANT WHEN I WANT, CLARE LOOKS THE WAY I WANT HER)
CROC CO 
CONTENT PLANNED 
- CUSTOM RAPIER FOR CLARE NAMED "RHAPSODY"
- CUSTOM BOW FOR CLARE NAMED "RHYTHUM"   
CREDIT TO

HELLOSANTA -> FOR YOUR AMAZING SG TEXTURES! CHEERS :)
BETHESDA -> FOR AN AMAZINGLY UN-STABLE CREATION KIT, THANKS A BUCKET LOAD!
HALOFARM -> CLARE USES A REALISTIC UNP VARIANT BODY, MORE SPECIFICLY THE UNPCM BODY MESHES, THANKS MATE!
LOGRAAM -> FOR THE EYES OF BEAUTY, CLARES EYES ARE AMAZING THANKS TO YOU!
 
THANKS TO 
- STUSMOKE -> FOR VOLUNTEERING TO BETA TEST MY MOD 
- THE LADS ON THE FPSGGAMERZ.COM -> CHEERS GUYS, LOVE THE SUPPORT <3
- THE GENERAL PUBLIC WHO ARE POSITIVE TOWARDS MY MOD -> THANKS GUYS, ILL SAVE YOU FIRST WHEN THE ZOMBIE APOCOLYPSE COMES
- THE HYPOCRITICAL COMMENTERS IN THE DISCUSSIONS SECTION OF MY MOD -> THANKS, WHAT DOESNT KILL ME MAKES ME STRONGER
author: Croc co aka Arbiterr13
